name: Shoe Carnival, Inc.
description: Shoe Carnival, Inc. is a leading retailer of family footwear, specializing in offering a wide selection of brand-name and private-label shoes at competitive prices. Founded in 1978 and headquartered in Evansville, Indiana, Shoe Carnival operates over 400 stores across the United States. The company is known for its unique shopping experience, which includes a lively in-store environment with an emphasis on customer service and a treasure-hunt atmosphere. Shoe Carnival's product range includes athletic shoes, casual footwear, sandals, and boots for men, women, and children. In addition to physical stores, Shoe Carnival has a robust online presence, providing customers with the convenience of shopping from home. The company frequently runs promotions and sales events, including its popular 'Buy One, Get One Half Off' offers, helping to drive customer traffic and sales. Shoe Carnival is committed to community involvement and environmental sustainability, participating in various charitable initiatives and programs. With its focus on value, variety, and customer engagement, Shoe Carnival continues to grow its brand and expand its reach in the competitive retail footwear market.
